statements: SELECT * FROM Biological_Pathways;
SELECT pathway_name, description FROM Biological_Pathways ORDER BY pathway_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Biological_Pathways WHERE pathway_name = 'Cell Cycle';
SELECT pathway_name, description FROM Biological_Pathways WHERE pathway_id = 3;
SELECT pathway_name, COUNT(*) AS pathway_count FROM Biological_Pathways GROUP BY pathway_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM Biological_Pathways WHERE pathway_id = 1;
SELECT pathway_name, description FROM Biological_Pathways WHERE description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT pathway_name, pathway_id FROM Biological_Pathways WHERE description LIKE '%cell%';
SELECT * FROM Biological_Pathways ORDER BY pathway_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Biological_Pathways WHERE pathway_name ILIKE '%growth%' ORDER BY pathway_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Pathways;
SELECT pathway_id, pathway_name FROM Pathways WHERE pathway_id = 1;
SELECT pathway_name, pathway_id FROM Pathways ORDER BY pathway_id DESC;
SELECT pathway_id, pathway_name FROM Pathways WHERE pathway_name LIKE '%cell%';
SELECT pathway_id, COUNT(*) AS total_interactions FROM Interactions GROUP BY pathway_id HAVING total_interactions > 2;
SELECT pathway_name FROM Pathways WHERE pathway_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Pathways ORDER BY pathway_name DESC;
SELECT pathway_id, pathway_name FROM Pathways JOIN Interactions ON Pathways.pathway_id = Interactions.pathway_id;
SELECT DISTINCT pathway_id, pathway_name FROM Pathways;
SELECT pathway_name, COUNT(*) AS interaction_count FROM Pathways JOIN Interactions ON Pathways.pathway_id = Interactions.pathway_id GROUP BY pathway_name ORDER BY interaction_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM Pathways;
SELECT pathway_name, description FROM Pathways;
SELECT pathway_name, gene_name FROM Pathways, Genes, Interactions WHERE Pathways.pathway_id = Interactions.pathway_id AND Genes.gene_id = Interactions.gene_id;
SELECT pathway_name, gene_name, interaction_type FROM Pathways, Genes, Interactions WHERE Pathways.pathway_id = Interactions.pathway_id AND Genes.gene_id = Interactions.gene_id ORDER BY pathway_name;
SELECT pathway_name, gene_name, interaction_type FROM Pathways, Genes, Interactions WHERE Pathways.pathway_id = Interactions.pathway_id AND Genes.gene_id = Interactions.gene_id LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM Pathways WHERE pathway_name = 'Cell Signaling'
SELECT pathway_name, description FROM Pathways ORDER BY pathway_name DESC
SELECT gene_name, description FROM Genes WHERE gene_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT pathway_name, gene_name, interaction_type FROM Pathways INNER JOIN Interactions ON Pathways.pathway_id = Interactions.pathway_id ORDER BY interaction_type ASC
SELECT * FROM Interactions WHERE pathway_id IN (SELECT pathway_id FROM Pathways WHERE pathway_name = 'Metabolic Pathway')
SELECT * FROM Pathways;
SELECT pathway_id, pathway_name FROM Pathways ORDER BY pathway_id DESC;
SELECT gene_name FROM Genes WHERE pathway_id = 'abc-123';
SELECT gene_name FROM Genes ORDER BY gene_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT protein_name, gene_name FROM Proteins JOIN Genes ON Proteins.gene_id = Genes.gene_id WHERE Proteins.protein_id = 'xyz-456';
SELECT * FROM Pathways;
SELECT gene_name, pathway_name FROM Genes JOIN Pathways ON Genes.pathway_id = Pathways.pathway_id;
SELECT protein_name, gene_name, pathway_name FROM Proteins JOIN Genes ON Proteins.gene_id = Genes.gene_id JOIN Pathways ON Genes.pathway_id = Pathways.pathway_id;
SELECT gene_name AS GeneName, interaction_type AS InteractionType FROM Genes JOIN Interactions ON Genes.gene_id = Interactions.gene_id1;
SELECT DISTINCT pathway_name FROM Pathways JOIN Genes ON Pathways.pathway_id = Genes.pathway_id JOIN Proteins ON Genes.gene_id = Proteins.gene_id;
SELECT pathway_id, pathway_name FROM pathway;
SELECT protein_id, protein_name, gene_id FROM protein ORDER BY protein_name;
SELECT * FROM interaction WHERE protein1_id = 1;
SELECT gene_id, gene_name FROM gene WHERE gene_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT pathway_name, gene_name FROM pathway JOIN gene ON pathway.pathway_id = gene.pathway_id;
SELECT pathway_name, gene_name, protein_name FROM pathway INNER JOIN gene ON pathway.pathway_id = gene.pathway_id INNER JOIN protein ON gene.gene_id = protein.gene_id;
SELECT pathway_name, COUNT(*) AS gene_count FROM pathway JOIN pathway_gene_mapping ON pathway.pathway_id = pathway_gene_mapping.pathway_id GROUP BY pathway.pathway_name;
SELECT protein_name, interaction_desc FROM protein JOIN interaction ON protein.protein_id = interaction.protein1_id OR protein.protein_id = interaction.protein2_id;

SELECT pathway.pathway_name, gene.gene_name, protein_name, interaction_desc FROM pathway INNER JOIN gene ON pathway.pathway_id = gene.pathway_id INNER JOIN protein ON gene.gene_id = protein.gene_id INNER JOIN interaction ON protein.protein_id = interaction.protein1_id OR protein.protein_id = interaction.protein2_id;
SELECT pathway_name, SUM(LENGTH(gene_name)) AS total_gene_length FROM pathway JOIN gene ON pathway.pathway_id = gene.pathway_id GROUP BY pathway.pathway_name ORDER BY total_gene_length DESC;
